description.value: Echolocation. The bat can't use its &Reference[blindsight]{Blindsight} while &Reference[deafened]{deafened}.

description.value: Amphibious. The crab can breathe air and water.

monsterMunch.description: Amphibious. The crab can breathe air and water.

biography.value: A frog has no effective attacks. It feeds on small insects and typically dwells near water, in trees, or underground. The frog's statistics can also be used to represent a toad.

description.value: Amphibious. The frog can breathe air and water.

monsterMunch.description: Amphibious. The frog can breathe air and water.

description.value: Standing Leap. The frog's long jump is up to 10 feet and its high jump is up to 5 feet, with or without a running start.

monsterMunch.description: Standing Leap. The frog's long jump is up to 10 feet and its high jump is up to 5 feet, with or without a running start.

description.value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

description.value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage, and the target is &Reference[grappled]{grappled} (escape DC 10). Until this grapple ends, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

monsterMunch.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 10). Until this grapple ends, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

description.value: A 5-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

monsterMunch.titleHTML: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).
monsterMunch.fullName: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).
monsterMunch.description: A 5-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

description.value: Hold Breath. While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

monsterMunch.description: Hold Breath. While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

description.value: Underwater Camouflage. The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (&Reference[ste]{stealth}) checks made while underwater.

monsterMunch.description: Underwater Camouflage. The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

description.value: Water Breathing. The octopus can breathe only underwater.

monsterMunch.description: Water Breathing. The octopus can breathe only underwater.

description.value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

monsterMunch.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

description.value: Flyby. The owl doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

monsterMunch.description: Flyby. The owl doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

description.value: Keen Hearing and Sight. The owl has advantage on Wisdom (&Reference[prc]{perception}) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

monsterMunch.description: Keen Hearing and Sight. The owl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

description.value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must make a [[/save con 10 format=long]], taking 5 (2d4) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsterMunch.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw, taking 5 (2d4) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

biography.value: A quipper is a carnivorous fish with sharp teeth. Quippers can adapt to any aquatic environment, including cold subterranean lakes. They frequently gather in swarms; the statistics for a swarm of quippers appear later in this appendix.

description.value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

monsterMunch.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

description.value: Blood Frenzy. The quipper has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

monsterMunch.description: Blood Frenzy. The quipper has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

description.value: Water Breathing. The quipper can breathe only underwater.

monsterMunch.description: Water Breathing. The quipper can breathe only underwater.

description.value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

description.value: Mimicry. The raven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 10 Wisdom (&Reference[ins]{insight}) check.

monsterMunch.description: Mimicry. The raven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

description.value: Water Breathing. The sea horse can breathe only underwater.

monsterMunch.description: Water Breathing. The sea horse can breathe only underwater.

description.value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 9 [[/save con format=long]] or take 2 (1d4) poison damage.

monsterMunch.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 9 Constitution saving throw or take 2 (1d4) poison damage.

description.value: Spider Climb. The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

monsterMunch.description: Spider Climb. The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

description.value: Web Sense. While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

monsterMunch.description: Web Sense. While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

description.value: Web Walker. The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

monsterMunch.description: Web Walker. The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

description.value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.
